import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import { ROUTES } from "../sidebar/sidebar.component"; @Component({ selector: "app-rtl-sidebar", templateUrl: "./rtl-sidebar.component.html", styleUrls: ["./rtl-sidebar.component.scss"] }) export class RtlSidebarComponent implements OnInit { menuItems: any[]; constructor() {} ngOnInit() { this.menuItems = ROUTES.filter(menuItem => menuItem); } }
